Episode One √® la prima espansione stand-alone di quel capolavoro di Half life 2. La storia riprende proprio dove si era concluso il capitolo precedente ovvero con l‚Äôesplosione della Cittadella e ancora una volta la trama risulta decisamente appassionante.
Tutte le caratteristiche che rendono Half life 2 un capolavoro si ripresentano con sezioni action e di risoluzione di enigmi ambientali basati sulla fisica perfettamente amalgamati. In questo capitolo avremo poi la possibilit√† di conoscere ancora meglio molti dei personaggi secondari e in particolare Alex Vance che sar√† una vera e propria co-protagonista e ci accompagner√† e aiuter√† per lunghi tratti del gioco. 
Da giocare assolutamente insieme ad Episode 2!
The story continues from where the half-life 2 left. It's a very short tough.
Barely remember this bit honestly I think it's ight like a 6/10

Half-life 2: Episode One is an interesting game, but not as good as Half-life 2. However, I would still recommend this game to everybody.
6/10.
It's a cool addition to the base game, the missions are fun and we get to see what happened to City 17 after the ending of HL.

Good addition to HL2, although a bit short. Having Alyx follow you through the game all the time is really fun and it makes the game feel less lonely than HL2

8/10, 4h to beat
It's great. Continues the story, but it's a little short. 9/10
nao me lembro oq acontece no jogo mas e legal

Primer cap√≠tulo que contin√∫a la historia de Half Life 2.

Lo primero que tienes que saber es que, este juego NO ES UNA EXPANSI√ìN.
Es m√°s de lo mismo que Half Life 2: mismos enemigos, mismas armas, etc. Solo hay nuevos niveles que contin√∫an con la sinopsis, pero no traen m√°s contenido.

Realmente no tengo mucho de que hablar.
Si ya te gust√≥ Half Life 2 y quieres saber lo que ocurre a continuaci√≥n despu√©s de su final, pues ser√≠a bueno comprar sus dos episodios.



Es importante que juegues primero el Half Life 2 antes que este!
Half Life 2 empieza la historia y los episodios la contin√∫an, as√≠ que prueba primero el juego original antes de adentarte en este.

Half life 2 Episode one is ‚Äúalright‚Äù

The game itself is a continuation of well, Half life 2 which did end on a cliffhanger.
But the way the game plays is fine it‚Äôs more half life with high moments I forgot the first time I played it. But is it bad?

Simply: no

Alyx Vance is a character I genuinely like, but she‚Äôs not fun to have to slug around and escort,and not to mention some of here quips and such are awful, but she was still useful in fights, mostly because she has unlimited ammo and the fact her health regenerates so quickly,
But she‚Äôs not balanced not to mention not being able to kill friendly npcs takes away the feeling of choice in the original so Alyx gets a eh.

The level design is okay with certain holes in the ground the player will just fall through as part of the ‚Äúdesign‚Äù and often it can be difficult to get out of corners while trapped.

But I have all the achievements for this game all of them and the main one is ‚ÄúThe One Free Bullet‚Äù. This achievement is a pain to get and often you'll just be using Alyx to kill enemies and use random props as weapons, which often do nothing to enemies, it was awful to get and getting the crowbar near the end is a mistake on Valve‚Äôs part.

But it was still fun and did feel like more Half Life so‚Ä¶

If you like the series and want more play it but if not don‚Äôt.
This is the first game that you should play even if you live in year 3000!

good game
short for its price though

Hey guys its me,pee pee poo poo,this game is okay. 10/10

Episode One is like a smaller mirror to the main game: you are at different places in City 17 but the chapters from HL2 re-emerge when you fight Combines in the citadel with your enhanced gravity gun again, when you fight zombies in an underground garage while waiting for the elevator, when you fight antlions and their guardian and when you run to and fro in the ruined city fighting Combines, a bugship, a strider and a sniper.

Still, this short continuation of the same brings some memorable moments like when fighting a bugship in the hospital's attic, with the planks of the roof falling apart with every salvo. And the ending of the game is just epic.

If you like completing achievements, however, this Episode will be a tedious one because you are allowed to shoot just one bullet at the beginning. I don't know why Valve brings achievements into their games and then makes them annoying.

There's not much gameplay time to this and the cheevos are fairly easy to do, but the levels were quite fun and you get to do some story progress. The soundtrack was awesome and also, bonus points for the spooky ending. I'm looking forward to playing HL2 : Episode Two.
:D half life will never dispoint me lol GABE GIVE US HALF LIFE 3

The sequel of Half-Life 2 - Episode One. It's as good as the first game from the 2nd trilogy. Better thing about Episode One is that Gordon and Alyx are working as a team more than the first HL 2. I ran through the whole game and Alyx was always behind my back, covering me from the combines and any kind of enemy. Gordon & Alyx are the best team and Half-Life is the best game ever.
This Half life 2 game is weaker out of the bunch but still an amazing game

This is an awesome expansion, although I recommend picking it up on a sale as it'll only take about 2-3 hours to beat if you only plan on playing it once. This expansion adds a bit more content to the main game, with a few extra types of puzzles to figure out. After this expansion, you'll want to go right into Episode 2.
Every bit as good as the first part, although unfortunately, not as long.

This was a short continuation of the second game and it only took me a couple of hours to play through. I have to admit that I am not a huge fan of cityscapes and I don't really like crawling through concrete jungles, but at the end of the day it is still a half life game and I did enjoy playing it. The level design is not TOO linear and the dialogue between Alex and other characters was fun to listen to at times. Get this DLC on sale if you really enjoy the series.
If you love Half Life series, there is no point that you wouldn't like this one.
